submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
        verticalCut.sort(reverse=True)
        horizontalCut.sort(reverse=True)
        lv=len(verticalCut)
        lh=len(horizontalCut)
        r,c=1,1
        i,j=0,0
        cost=0
        while i<lh or j<lv:
            if i<lh and j<lv:
                if horizontalCut[i]>verticalCut[j]:
                    cost+=horizontalCut[i]*c
                    r+=1
                    i+=1
                else:
                    cost+=verticalCut[j]*r
                    c+=1
                    j+=1
            elif i<lh:
                cost+=horizontalCut[i]*c
                r+=1
                i+=1
            else:
                cost+=verticalCut[j]*r
                c+=1
                j+=1
        return cost
